name: Cat Calling You! Fake Calls
description:
Receive Call from pretty cats now, Yes, You can make it look like you calling Kitten Cat! Raffle friends, including fake bell the cats and show a friend, he will be very surprised!

Share close, let think that phoning your favorite pet! Make fun of a lot of fun! In the game you can choose different cats for a call! A real blast and a voice straight out of the tube!

Features:

• Simulate fake incoming call from cats.
• Cat sounds.
• Phone Ringtone.
• Options to decline, or, accept call.
• Great as a game.
• Easy to use.
• No need for Wi-Fi to play for more fun.

Thank you for playing with us leave us your feedback and we will try to make our game even better and more interesting!
